hero.description: Transforming ideas into exceptional digital experiences. Full-Stack Developer & UX/UI Designer passionate about creating user-centered solutions that make an impact.

about.title: About Me
about.introduction:
Hi! I'm a full-stack web developer and product designer with over 15 years of experience in content production. Throughout my career, I've led a wide range of projects and collaborated with teams and clients from around the world, especially in the technology and events sectors.

My passion for interactivity and technology led me to naturally transition into digital design and web development. What drives me is creating digital products that go beyond functionality—products that are truly accessible, engaging, and centered on real human needs.

webDesign.title: Web Design
webDesign.description: Crafting stunning and responsive websites that capture your brand's essence and engage your audience.

uiUxDesign.title: UI/UX Design
uiUxDesign.description: Enhancing UX with intuitive and aesthetically pleasing interface designs, creating comprehensive design systems, and delivering seamless experiences for both web and mobile applications.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Building robust, scalable, and high-performance websites using the latest technologies to ensure a seamless UX.

projects.title: Selected Projects
projects.introduction: Explore my portfolio showcasing a blend of modern web development, intuitive design, and technical expertise. Each project represents a unique challenge in creating seamless digital experiences that combine aesthetics with functionality.

cta.title: Let's work together
cta.description: Get in touch and let's bring your ideas to life

underConstruction.title: Under Construction
underConstruction.description: This project is currently being developed. Check back soon to see the amazing things we're building!
